str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a people.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A publican, collector of taxes. From telos and oneomai; a tax-farmer, i.e. Collector of public revenue.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From dikaios; to render just or innocent.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Lit: I dip, submerge, but specifically of ceremonial dipping; I baptize.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.
